landing.title: Frontend Developer
landing.description1: Transforming ideas into intuitive and attractive interfaces
landing.description2: Developing innovative and efficient web solutions

infosection.title: About Me
infosection.description1: As a front-end developer, I specialize in creating robust and scalable web applications. While my focus is on front-end development, I have knowledge of back-end technologies, which allows me to build complete solutions from scratch.
infosection.description2: I am passionate about creating unique and engaging interfaces that showcase my skills and allow me to exceed my own expectations. Additionally, I enjoy the constant learning process and tackling new challenges that help me improve and adapt my skills to the ever-changing needs of web development.

contactsection.title: Let's Talk!
contactsection.subtitle: If you have any questions, ideas or simply want to say hi, let's get in touch!
